**Installing R Packages**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggrepel, patchwork, 
               ggthemes, hrbrthemes,
               tidyverse,ggplot2)
```
:::


**Loading Data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


Visualing Histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20,
                 boundary = 100,
                 color='grey25',
                 fill='grey90') +
  theme_gray() +
  ggtitle("Distribution of English scores")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
